# Build directories
build/
*.o
*.d
*.elf
*.bin
*.map
*.hex

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~
.DS_Store

# Compiled object files
*.a
*.la
*.lo
*.obj

# Dependency files
*.dep

# Debug files
*.dSYM/
*.su

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.log

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# macOS
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride
._*

# Python (if using build scripts)
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class
*.pyc

# ARM compiler generated
*.lst
*.axf

# Tags and symbols
tags
TAGS
cscope.*
*.taghl

# Backup files
*~.nib
*.orig
